name: delvecchio-home-care
description: a reusable setup script that starts a complete eleventy web project with modern development tooling, automated formatting, linting, and ci/cd pipelines.   this repo lets you create clean, production-ready projects in seconds, without configuring anything by hand.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.precommit: npm run format:check && npm run lint
